name: Space's Anthem
description:
You must go to kill all the enemy ships. As you progress, the enemies become stronger. Take  your courage with both hands to go face your enemies !

In this little shmup you'll test your skills with three levels having each one : A music, a different background, stronger enemies.

There are 9 waves of enemies per level. Complete all of them to finish the level;

Controls :
  • W, A, S, D to move
  • Space to drop the select projectile in the hotbar
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click to put a bomb, Right to explode it
  • R to make disappear all the projectiles on the screen
  • Q-E / Left Arrow / Right  Arrow / Numbers to go through the hotbar

To make this game I used some graphical game assets which can be find here ->

  1. https://ansimuz.itch.io/space-background
  2. https://ansimuz.itch.io/explosion-animations-pack

Everything else was made by me.

There will be updates in the future !
